column3: str
This luckless merchant is desperate for help.
Obtain the stolen sack.
Deliver the stolen sack to Ansger.
Deliver the crate of minerals to the luckless merchant.
Hello there, friend. Don't suppose you'd have time to help a man in his hour of need?
I'd come here to buy minerals that I was meant to supply the Resistance with. The only problem is, I was robbed of all my gil by Qiqirn bandits on the way here!
Who's going to use a merchant that can't deliver the goods he claims to sell? Please, head to Momoroon's Milk and take back my money.
Once you have collected my gil, give it to a man by the name of Ansger in this village. He's the one I had procure the minerals for me.
In the meantime, I'll head back to Rhalgr's Reach and ask them to wait a little longer for their order. Bring the minerals to me as soon as you have them.
Hello there, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>lass<Else/>lad</If>! Do you have business with me?
The merchant who ordered the minerals asked you to bring me his payment? I take it you must've reclaimed his gil from those pesky Qiqirn?
Ha ha, you have my thanks! I was not best pleased when I heard he would be late in paying me.
Here are his minerals. Get them to him as quickly as possible. No doubt he's worrying himself sick.
Get his minerals to him as quickly as possible. No doubt that merchant's worrying himself sick.
The minerals. Do you have them?
Oh, I am positively indebted to you. At last, I can fulfill the Resistance's order.
Frankly speaking, the minerals found around Ala Gannha aren't of the best quality.
But I can't help but want to support a struggling village. They have been through so much.

I will need to be careful I do not go the same way as their quarry. I had made a point of not hiring protection when traveling to save on money, but I'm not much use to anyone if I'm robbed of all my gil. Here, take this as a token of my thanks.
